duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage project plans, identifying and articulating success criteria and ensuring the delivery of intended results.
Identify and manage project risk, partner cross-functionally with customers and delivery teams, and provide thought partnership to drive project delivery.
Understand and capture business requirements, evaluate how to break them into smaller distinct deliverables, and manage work in a dynamic environment.
Demonstrate excellent project management, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills to handle challenging workloads and tight deadlines.
Facilitate planning sessions with various internal and external stakeholders, establish strong relationships, and articulate messages in a concise and professional manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, or a related field (PMP certification preferred)
